Author: cryptostarter
Title: [ICO]‚ù§ CryptoStarter - CryptoCrowdfunding. Turns promises into tradable tokens.
Body: ‚ù§Ô∏è   ‚ù§Ô∏è   ‚ù§Ô∏è  üíô CryptoStarter üíô  ‚ù§Ô∏è   ‚ù§Ô∏è   ‚ù§Ô∏è  ‚ÄúBlockchain crowdfuning platform. Accepts cryptocurrencies. Turns promises into tradable tokens.‚Äù  Whitepaper: https://cryptostarter.io/whitepaper.pdf  Official website: https://cryptostarter.io  ‚ù§Ô∏è   ‚ù§Ô∏è   ‚ù§Ô∏è  üíôPre-ICO begins on  FEBRUARY 2ND 2018üíô  ‚ù§Ô∏è   ‚ù§Ô∏è   ‚ù§Ô∏è   Due to recent ETHEREUM price increase (more than 5-fold increase)  we have to adjust the price  per 1 IDEA token. The new price is lower than old price as 1:10  ‚ù§Ô∏è DURING PRE-ICO  1 ETH =  15 000 IDEA TOKENS ‚ù§Ô∏è ‚ù§Ô∏è( with current ETH price 1 IDEA  ~  0.073 USD ) ‚ù§Ô∏è  During pre-ICO  only 2 500 000 IDEA will be offered.  ALL UNSOLD  IDEA TOKENS IN EACH PHASE OF ICO  WILL BE BURNED FOREVER.   üöÄ This price is only during PRE-ICO. üöÄ PRE-ICO will be open for a limited time.  There is no minimum contribution for pre-ICO.  ‚ùó PLEASE USE ONLY OFFICIAL WEBSITE HTTPS://CRYPTOSTARTER.IO TO FIND ALL THE INFORMATION ON PRE-ICO AND TO PARTICIPATE ‚ùó   Whitelist registration is open! Please register on our website: HTTPS://CRYPTOSTARTER.IO  Motivation background & problem statement:  Crowdfunding lets new ideas and businesses raise money by selling the future product directly to the customers before the product creation. This allows direct validation of an idea by future customers. This also creates a relationship with the future customers instantly, alowing a quick communication channel and feedback. However Crowdfunding faces challenges. Compaigners have nothing more than a promise to give back to backers. Ownership of a future product can not be transferred to others. Setting up crowdfunding campaign to accept crypto currency is complicated.  The challenge that CryptoStarter attempts to solve is to connect crowdfunding and  crypto currency, at the same time making it simple to use and accessible to non-technical artists and entrepreneurs.   Despite rapid development of crypto currency markets not all potential participants were able to use crypto currency advantages due to a number of reasons. Starting from the country where crypto currency lacks local support and up to simply the lack of knowledge and motivation to learn how to use crypto currency.    CryptoStarter description:  With CryptoStarter campaigners can create their own project tokens,  tokens can be redeemed for a product , can be a 'digital share of future company' (ICO), tokens can be traded.   Cryptostarter gives instant marketplace for project tokens.   Since the amount of project tokens is set to be limited, the price changes. Buy, Sell project tokens  right before the future product release. Simplicity of use Cryptostarter is designed to be used by anyone.  Launching your crowdfunding  project is 1 click away. Anyone holding a cryptostarter token IDEA-coin,  receives 3.5% Rewards from every crowdfunding campgain on the platform.    More details can be found on our official website: https://cryptostarter.io  CONNECT WITH US:  Twitter: https://twitter.com/cryptostarterio Facebook: www.facebook.com/cryptostarter.io Bitcointalk https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2606195.0 Reddit     https://www.reddit.com/user/cryptostarterio   Telegram Official News Channel: https://t.me/cryptostarterio Join Telegram Community Group Chat: https://t.me/cryptostartergroup Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC29Wyb3xb0bCClQwYkX8vZw   Press releases:  Medium: https://medium.com/@cryptostarter.io/introducing-cryptostarter-platform-decentralized-crowdfunding-that-turns-promises-into-tokens-a990815aa470 Steemit: https://steemit.com/cryptostarter/@cryptostarterio/introducing-cryptostarter-platform-decentralized-crowdfunding-that-turns-promises-into-tokens

Author: cryptostarter
Title: [ICO]‚ù§ CryptoStarter - CryptoCrowdfunding. Turns promises into tradable tokens.
Body: Our consensus algorithm at the early stage of the project  is not Proof of Work, it is generic PoS initially. 100 million IDEACOIN tokens (IDEA) has been created and will be distributed during 3 periods:  pre-ICO ICO and post-ICO periods.  Although the final total supply will be defined by the amount of distributed IDEA tokens. The rest of undistributed tokens will be burned (sent to an account with no private key and lost forever).  That means that the total supply can be much less than 100 million.  It can be between 1 million and 100 million. For instance  assuming 30 millions were distributed during ICO periods, then 70 millions will be burned forever.  Initially planned ETH/IDEA ratio is 1:1000  You can have a look on ETHERSCAN.IO at the source code of our ICO smart contract, which will be autonomously distributing the IDEA tokens during ICO. It has already been successfully verified to comply ERC20 Standard. Here is the link: https://etherscan.io/address/0xa6047765e275522bfa0ef6638cbc402de023aa86#code  You can find more details about upcoming pre-ICO on official website of CryptoStarter project: https://cryptostarter.io

Author: cryptostarter
Title: [ICO]‚ù§ CryptoStarter - CryptoCrowdfunding. Turns promises into tradable tokens.
Body: PRE-ICO  ANNOUNCEMENT  pre-ICO of CryptoStarter platform starts on February 2nd, 2018 12:00 GMT.  Please do not send ETH from an exchange account, most likely, in this case, CST won't be credited. Please use ONLY your own Ethereum wallet to participate in pre-ICO, you will be credited with CST immediately after sending ETH to our ico smart contract address.  Trust only our official website ( https://cryptostarter.io ) , we don't use any other resource to perform ICO.  The Cryptostarter token name:   CST  The pre-ICO price:   1 ETH = 1500 CST  Details and ICO is on our project's website: https://cryptostarter.io   STAY TUNED FOR MORE OFFICIAL UPDATES.  Twitter: https://twitter.com/cryptostarterio Facebook: www.facebook.com/cryptostarter.io Bitcointalk: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2606195.0 Reddit:     https://www.reddit.com/user/cryptostarterio  Telegram Official News Channel: https://t.me/cryptostarterio Join Telegram Community Group Chat: https://t.me/cryptostartergroup

Author: robertgalvin
Title: [ICO]‚ù§ CryptoStarter - CryptoCrowdfunding. Turns promises into tradable tokens.
Body: I just started to watch this project.  Regarding the price for the token  on pre-ICO and ICO,  they have a telegram group, I've talked to somebody from their team and  as far as I understood, they're gonna lower the price to adjust it to the recent higher price of Ethereum.   I haven't seen the announcement yet, but i think they're gonna make one soon.   I've read their whitepaper, i like the idea, it's viable, the platform will let you generate your own tokens and perform your own ICO or crowdfunding via crypto, plus the results from ICOs & crowdfundings conducted via platform will be shared among all  participants of the platform who holds CST, i don't remember what % was it though.    I think I'm gonna definitely invest in this one.
